home.title: Villa Azur
home.subtitle: Experience luxury and comfort
home.description: An exceptional 500mÂ² villa nestled between sky and sea, offering an incomparable luxury experience on the French Riviera.

service.title: Tailored service
service.description: Each stay at Villa Azur is a unique experience, with personalized service to satisfy your most demanding desires.

cabinets.title: Upper and lower cabinets
cabinets.description: Upper cabinets with invisible fixings and smoked glass center, elevated lower cabinets with two shelves and 15% extra space.

counter.title: Countertop and backsplash
counter.description: Black quartz countertop with contrasting matte finish, tempered glass backsplash for easy cleaning.

sink.title: Sink and faucet
sink.description: Stainless steel undermount sink with pull-out faucet featuring variable flow for added flexibility.

dishwasher.title: Smart dishwasher
dishwasher.description: Built-in dishwasher with eco program and automatic load detection for optimized consumption.

fridge.title: Combined refrigerators
fridge.description: Combined refrigerator-freezer with No-Frost compartments and special fresh zone for sensitive foods.

oven.title: Oven and Microwave
oven.description: Multifunction oven with steam function and combined microwave for quick and healthy cooking.

stove.title: Cooking surface
stove.description: Induction cooktop with 5 cooking zones and variable bridge to adapt to all types of cookware.

island.title: Central island
island.description: Central island with integrated storage and concealed electrical outlets for added convenience.

exterior.alt: Villa exterior with pool and sea view

living.alt: Luxurious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows

master.title: Master Suite
master.description: A spacious master suite with panoramic sea view, marble bathroom and walk-in closet.

main.title: Main Living Room
main.description: An elegant living room with glass doors offering an incomparable view of the Mediterranean.

terrace.title: Terrace & Pool
terrace.description: A vast terrace with infinity pool and relaxation area with sea view.

gourmet.title: Gourmet Kitchen
gourmet.description: A fully equipped kitchen with central island and high-end appliances.
